item.name: Users

request.description: This is just a test carried out on postman. Ignore it.

item.description:
This folder holds all the API routes responsible for a user(customer) journey and all activities that can be carried out by the user. I.e .

- creating a new account
- deleting an existing account.
- getting a user's details.

item.name: riders

response.name: login-rider

item.description:
These endpoints handle all the action related to the riders. they include:

- Account creation
- Account login
- Account update
- Account deletion.
